I

io.vertx.ext.asyncsql - package io.vertx.ext.asyncsql
= Vert.x MySQL / PostgreSQL service The MySQL / PostgreSQL Service is responsible for providing an interface for Vert.x applications that need to interact with a MySQL or PostgreSQL database.
